Vebbo version 1.0.0 Vebbo App Invite Download the Vebbo app now to video chat with random users, meet people and make new friends on a button click. Available on Google play or download using the link below:

Request Permission Failed!
INFO: Vebbo is a free live streaming platform, bringing people together by providing short video streams.

 HOW IT WORKS: 1. Click on the "Tv" button to start a stream, end at any time by clicking the "End" button. 

2. The stream counter shows your position and if you are next to stream, the server automatically selects the next stream. 
You can stream for 5 min for free or add more time by paying a little token. 

3. You can drop a note for everyone online to see by clicking the "Add Note" button at the bottom right corner when streaming. 

NOTE: If reported more than the set threshold, your stream will be terminated and/or your device will be blocked from starting a new stream, so avoid any illicit or inappropriate behaviours. 

 By using Vebbo you agree to our terms of service (See Settings). 
For bug reports, suggestions, complaints, inquiries and feedback kindly send us a mail.

Legal: In use of this app, I hereby agree to the ‘Vebbo’ terms and conditions 2021. PRIVACY POLICY 

 1. COLLECTION OF INFORMATION We collect information such as usage statistics from your use of the app, the creation of your account and any communications with ourselves. 
 This information collected includes your personal data such as your name and email address. Any information you choose to provide will be collected via the app.
DEVICE INFORMATION WE COLLECT: 

 Log information: Information regarding your use of the app on your device is stored including access times, your IP address and how you’ve interacted with our platform. Hardware Information: We collect information about your mobile device used to access our product. This includes: Your operating system and version and network information. Location Information: The app uses location information to provide a better experience this data is stored from your device each time you choose to use location services within the app.
2. USE OF INFORMATION: We use information collected from you to improve and protect the Vebbo's platform and it’s users. 
 User queries and discussion We may also use information about you when: 
 - Responding to your comments, questions and requests regarding the services provided by Vebbo. - Send you information, updates and support with your permission - Communicate with you about products, services and information offered by us. 3. SHARING INFORMATION: 

 We do not share any of your information without your consent. This information may be used to improve the platform but will not be sent to any third-party service providers. The product may implement sharing features across social media platforms and services. The services use of this information will be governed by their own privacy policies and conditions.
4. SECURITY: 

 We are concerned with the security of all transactions made within our app that is why our payment platform are encrypted for safe transactions and card details are not sent, saved, shared or revealed to any third party before or after any payment, they are cached locally to on your device. 
 Note: All tokens generated are stored locally on your device and are validated on our server before use, so it is advised not to clear app data after token is purchased.
5. YOUR CHOICES: 

 We would like to remind the user that the way they use the platform must adhere to our use policies and that you may be liable for any misconduct. If you do not wish to adhere to the policies outlined in this documentation. Email stackdriveinc@gmail.com to deactivate your account. These policies are subject to status and may be changed in the future when this occurs the app will be updated with the changes outlined. 


USE POLICES: 

 Any unlawful use of the app will be notified to local police services to be further investigated. Your personal information and service data will be given. We may modify, suspend or terminate your account if, in our sole discretion we decide that you have violated the policies or guidelines that are part of this agreement, or to protect the platform and its users. Any fees or payments made to the platform currently (or in the future) are paid by you the user and any queries regarding payments will be handled individually depending on outlined circumstances. 

THIRD PARTY LIBRARY LICENSES APPRECIATION: 

 Special thanks goes to these free and/or open-source software libraries (FOSS) used in production of ‘Vebbo’ app Android. 1. INTUIT SSP AND SDP LIB: Scalable Size and Display 2. HDODENHOF IMAGEVIEW LIB: Circle Images 3. DROIDSONROIDS LIB: GIF GENERAL LIB LICENSE:
